overview: Egor, a former rally champion, works in the "sober driver" service, delivering tipsy customers home. Once he himself got drunk behind the wheel, which once led to tragedy. His wife died in an accident... Fate brings Egor and Dasha together, and when the girl is in danger, he, without hesitation, rushes to her aid. Dasha finds herself involved in gang warfare, in which Morozov, the "werewolf" policeman, also participates. Dasha helped her beloved escape from prison and for his sake stole money from a safe from an unprincipled thief official. But Sultanov decides to kill Dasha so as not to share money with her...
title: Potseluy v golovu
